list.title: animationSequence
list.description:
It creates an animation sequence for each element that has a `sscSequence` attribute,
and then it plays or pauses the animation based on the element's visibility

list.title: animationSvgPath
list.description: If the element is in the viewport, animate the SVG paths

list.title: handleAnimation
list.description: Animate Element using Anime.css when the element is in the viewport

list.title: imageScaleController
list.description:
This controller launches the imagescale "animation" type and is triggered when the mouse is over the image

If the mouse enters the image, add the mouse wheel event listener to the image.
If the mouse leaves the image, remove the mouse wheel event listener from the image

The function is called by the IntersectionObserver.

list.title: jumpToScreen
list.description: For each jumper, when clicked, jump to the screen.

list.title: navigator
list.description: A wrapper that watch the current position and updates

list.title: parallaxController
list.description:
If the item is entering the viewport, add it to the watched list and start the parallax function.
If the item is leaving the viewport, remove it from the watched list

list.title: scrollJacking
list.description: It scrolls to the target element

list.title: textAnimated
list.description: It checks if the element has already been animated, and if not, it either animates the number or the text

list.title: textStagger
list.description: It splits the text into individual letters, then animates them in a staggered fashion

list.title: video360Controller
list.description:
It adds a mousemove event listener to the video element,
which updates the video's current time based on the mouse's position creating the image 360 effect

list.title: videoFocusPlay
list.description: The above code is a function handle the play state of the video and  is called when it is in viewport.

list.title: videoParallaxController
list.description: It checks if the video is partially visible, and if it is, it adds it to the `videoParallaxed` array

list.title: actionsTemplate
list.description: the advanced animation available parameters and defaults

list.title: addAttributes
list.description: The ssc additional panel settings.

list.title: addExtraProps
list.description:
I know this is not the save function but is a hook to change some data before
Add custom dataset to element before save.

list.title: addToTimeline
list.description: It adds an element to the timelines object

list.title: animateCount
list.description: Animate Numbers

list.title: animateWord
list.description:
Animate words and numbers
It splits the text into letters, wraps each letter in a span, and then animates each letter

list.title: AnimationAdvancedControls
list.description: Add mobile visibility controls on Advanced Block Panel.

list.title: autoLintCode
list.description: It takes a string of JavaScript code and adds a newline after every semicolon and opening curly brace

list.title: capitalToloDash
list.description: It takes a string and replaces all capital letters with a dash followed by the lowercase version of the letter

list.title: css2obj
list.description: It takes a string of CSS and returns an object of key/value pairs in jss format

list.title: dataStringify
list.description: It takes a data object and a type string, and returns a string of the data object's key/value pairs, separated by semicolons

list.title: delay
list.description: This function returns a promise that resolves after the given number of milliseconds.

list.title: disableWheel
list.description: It prevents That the mouse wheel can change the position on the page

list.title: editAttributes
list.description: It's a higher order component that adds the custom classes into block editor

list.title: enableScrollMagicIndicators
list.description: It enables the ScrollMagic indicators plugin.

list.title: getDefaults
list.description: It takes an animation type and returns the default values for that animation

list.title: getElelementData
list.description: Parses the dataset stored with wp editor and returns an object with the arguments as keys and values

list.title: hasMouseOver
list.description: If the mouse is over the element, return true.

list.title: hasScrolling
list.description: store if another scroll-jacking is running to avoid to be fire multiple

list.title: imageScale
list.description:
It takes a mouse wheel event value,
and applies a scale transform to the target image

list.title: initTimeline
list.description: For each timeline element, call the scrollTimeline function.

list.title: isActiveArea
list.description:
Check when the element center (the median between Y top and Y bottom ) is inside the active area

The element's center within 20% of the viewport's height from the top and bottom
The function returns true if the element's center is inside the active viewport, and false if it's not

list.title: isFullyVisible
list.description:
Checks when the element is completely inside in the viewport edges

"If the top of the element is greater than or equal to 0 and the bottom of the element is less than or equal to the height of the window, then the element is fully visible."

list.title: isInside
list.description:
Check when the element (top or bottom) is inside the active area, works well with elements larger than the screen like the jack scrolling container
The active area is a horizontal slice of the screen - the 80% active area in a 1000px height screen is the area between 100px from the top to 900px from the top (i.e. 800px height)

It returns true if the element top or bottom is inside the active viewport, and false if it's not

list.title: isInView
list.description: If the center of the element is between the top and bottom margins of the active area, then the element is in view

list.title: isPartiallyVisible
list.description:
Checks when the element is inside the viewport

If the top of the element is above the bottom of the viewport or the bottom of the element is below the top of the viewport, then the element is partially visible.

list.title: jumpTo
list.description: It takes the click event, finds the target element, and scrolls to it

list.title: lintCSS
list.description: It takes a jss style object and returns a string of linted CSS code

list.title: loDashToCapital
list.description: Replace all hyphens followed by a lowercase letter with the same letter capitalized.

list.title: ontouchmoveEvent
list.description:
detect weather the "old" touchPos is greater or smaller than the newTouchPos

If the new touch position is greater than the old touch position, the finger is moving down.
If the new touch position is less than the old touch position, the finger is moving up.

list.title: parallax
list.description:
The Parallax effect
Handles the Parallax effect for each item stored into "itemParallaxed" array

If the last scroll position is the same as the current scroll position, then request an animation frame and exit the current loop.
Otherwise, apply the parallax style to each element and request an animation frame callback.

The parallax function is called on the window's scroll event

list.title: parallaxVideos
list.description:
It loops through all the videos that have been registered for parallaxing,
and sets their current time to a value that is calculated based on the video's position on the screen

list.title: parseCSS
list.description:
It takes a string of CSS and converts it to an object
if this string is in jss format will be converted to css

list.title: screenBodyClass
list.description: It's adding a class to the body element when the user scrolls to the top of the page.

list.title: screenJackTo
list.description: It scrolls to the element passed to it

list.title: scrollDirection
list.description:
If the last scroll position is less than the current scroll position, the user is scrolling down.
If the last scroll position is greater than the current scroll position, the user is scrolling up

list.title: scrollMagic
list.description: Creating a new instance of the ScrollMagic controller.

list.title: scrollTimeline
list.description:
It creates a ScrollMagic scene for each timeline element,
and then binds the timeline animation to the scene progress

list.title: splitSentence
list.description:
Split a sentence into words or letters

It takes a sentence and splits it into words, then splits each word into letters

list.title: sscAnimationOptions
list.description: Set the animation options

list.title: sscOptionsDefault
list.description:
Exports the sscOptions object.
It returns an object with the rootMargin, threshold, and container properties

list.title: styleObj2String
list.description:
JSON style object to a CSS string

It takes an object of CSS styles and returns a string of CSS styles

list.title: touchstartEvent
list.description: It sets the touchPos property of the current object to the y-coordinate of the first touch point in the event's changedTouches list

list.title: videoOnWheel
list.description:
"If the video is not at the beginning or end, then move the video forward or backward by 1/29.7 of a second."

The first thing we do is prevent the default behavior of the event. This is because we don't want the browser to scroll the page when the user scrolls the video

list.title: videoParallaxCallback
list.description: It calculates the current time of the video based on the scroll position

list.title: videoWheelController
list.description: It adds a mousewheel event listener to the video element, and when the mousewheel event is triggered, it changes the playback rate of the video
